medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began last evening at 10 PM, worsening into sharp pain throughout the day. Patient reports anorexia with nausea and multiple episodes of bilious emesis.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Depression, subclinical hypothyroidism, intermittent asthma, chronic back pain, lupus.
medical_history.family_history: Father with hypothyroidism, father and maternal grandmother with rheumatoid arthritis, grandfather with stomach cancer.
